room_title: Escape room "Escape The Serial Killer" by Locked Up Escape Games in Buffalo
review: This place is great! Definitely the best escape room I've been to and the props inside make it VERY legit. Both the serial killer and pharoahs tomb rooms were well worth it and loads of fun!

room_title: Escape room "Escape The Serial Killer" by Locked Up Escape Games in Buffalo
review: First time doing an escape game. We picked Serial Killer. I was skeptical at first as I don’t care for scary anything, but this was great!! It was certainly challenging and fun. We didn’t make it out on time, but we sure did try hard and laugh a lot. Mikayla is awesome! Very personable and helpful. Definitely going back to try the Zombie room. Can’t wait!

room_title: Escape room "Escape The Serial Killer" by Locked Up Escape Games in Buffalo
review: Had an amazing time. The girl running the rooms did a great job. Serial killer was a lot of fun. Disappointed we didnt get out earlier. Survived by only by 6 minutes.

room_title: Escape room "Escape The Serial Killer" by Locked Up Escape Games in Buffalo
review: Just did the Serial Killer escape game with a group of friends and it was SO much fun and very challenging ! We will definitely be coming back for the zombie one!

room_title: Escape room "Escape The Serial Killer" by Locked Up Escape Games in Buffalo
review: So much fun. Went with work friends to Serial Killer. Loved it so much, will be going back with family and friends. It is a great team building lesson too.
